show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi PhD, RN, www.naturalnurse.com interviews Caroline Dow. <!--more--> Caroline is an award-winning Boulder, CO author (awards from BEA Latino, INATS, and Colorado Authors League) with sixteen books in print.
She holds a PhD in Luso-Brazilian Studies, speaks four languages, and has lived and traveled throughout Latin America and Europe.
  She writes both fiction and nonfiction under her name and the pen name Morwyn.
Some recent nonfiction topics are tealeaf reading, the physical benefits of tea drinking, herbs, Brazilian folk religions, aromatherapy, Wicca, and Magick.
She also writes Latina amateur sleuths and is working on an historical mystery set in Mexico City.
We will discuss her latest book, THE HEALING POWER OF TEA.   Contact:www.carolinedowbooks.com .
